data.title: What precautions do you take when severe weather warnings are issued in your area?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 2): 1. Confirm the car is in the garage and the garage door is closed.
2. Find and charge the crank-to-charge flashlight.
3. Find the candles. Put them in holders on the mantle with matches hear them.
4. If they forecast tornados plug in the tv in the basement.
